title: Change Ticket Delivery Method
description: A customer who chose to have their tickets mailed now wants to switch to digital mobile tickets.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the order and sees the delivery method is 'Standard Mail'.

tasks.description: Verify that the physical tickets have not yet been mailed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the tickets have not been shipped.

tasks.description: Cancel the physical ticket printing and change the delivery method to 'Mobile'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the delivery method.

tasks.description: Deliver the digital tickets to the customer's email.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the mobile tickets to the customer.
